Name: Woodside
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Strucchi Dry Vermouth grapefruit infused
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker and add other ingredients. DRY SHAKE (without ice), then SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Created in 2009 by Darren Thrower at The Kenilworth, Warwickshire, England and named after Count Basie's "Jumpin' at the Woodside".
